content: I am Amir-Hossein, a Computer Engineering BS.c student at Sharif University of Technology. I am also a R&D Engineer at CennaLab Project aiming at inventing an Intelligent medical image scanner. My research focus is at the intersection of Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning and Robotics and include (1) perception for robotics, (2) state estimation and control, (3) sim2real transfer. Let's not just to dream about SUPER-HUMANOID! but realize it.

title: Amir-Hossein Shahidzadeh
